content: As the title says, I’d really like a recent conversations view in the mobile apps, similar to the desktop and web versions. Those are usually the most relevant threads I’m searching in the app
This is tracked at https://github.com/zulip/zulip-flutter/issues/315. I've added your request to there.
I notice that it's in the 2026Q1 milestone, so it's relatively high in the priority right now
